content:
This Week in EOS

18th of June 2018

Editorial

Finally, after a few bumpy weeks since the release of the EOS software, the EOS mainnet is live! The 15% requirement was met on June 14th to the relief of the entire EOS community.

In the news, we have many things such as a bug that froze all transactions on the network. We also have many hackathons coming organised by both Block.One and Bitfinex. There is a lot of activity in the EOS world right now.

And with the mainnet going live developers can now unleash their creativity unto the world! So what are you waiting for? Get coding and have a nice week!

News

  • From block.one -Congratulations to the EOSIO Community
  • EOS Main Net Goes Live at Long Last
  • Upcoming EOS Airdrops in June
  • Cypherglass Offers $100k EOS Hardware Wallet Bounty
  • Block.one Launches EOS Global Hackathon Series With Hong Kong Event at Kai Tak
  • Breaking: EOS Blockchain Grinds to Halt as Software Bug Freezes Transactions
  • The ‘Bitfinex Hackathon’ Series
